```typescript
interface KiraAPIFeatures {
  performance: "‚ö° Ultra Fast Response < 200ms",
  security: "üõ°Ô∏è HTTPS & Rate Limiting",
  documentation: "üìö Detailed API Documentation",

```

</details>

<details>
<summary><h2>üöÄ Quick Start</h2></summary>

```bash
# Base URL
$ curl https://ara-pink.vercel.app

# Example: YouTube Search
$ curl -X GET "https://ara-pink.vercel.app/api/ytsearch?q=example"

# Response Format
{
  "status": true,
  "creator": "Kiara",
  "result": { ... }
}
```

</details>

```javascript
const platforms = {
```

  | DANA | GoPay | OVO | QRIS |
  |:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|
